org.kaaproject.kaa.client.channel

Interface ConfigurationTransport

  • All Superinterfaces:
    KaaTransport
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultConfigurationTransport

    public interface ConfigurationTransport
extends KaaTransport
    KaaTransport for the Configuration service. Updates the Configuration manager state.
    Author:
    Yaroslav Zeygerman
